snippet: Public financing is at the top of the list of business not finished by New York’s lawmakers.
abstract: Editorial criticizes New York lawmakers for failing to address run of indictments and arrests of public officials, specifically by reforming campaign finance laws.
lead_paragraph: Public financing is at the top of the list of business not finished by New York’s lawmakers.

headline.main: Lawmakers in Albany Should Stay Put
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers in Albany Should Stay Put
